item.title: The Immutable Links of Bitcoin and BTK (Crypto & Crime)
item.description:
Welcome to Shill Kill, where I pair a cryptocurrency review with a true crime case. As a Certified DeFi Expert and true crime enthusiast, I offer insight into a crypto project while also discussing a killer. Get ready for a unique fusion of finance and mystery! #cryptocurrency #truecrime


This episode's Shill: Bitcoin The Kill: BTK


Like video? Join thousands of followers on Spotify. Or search Shill Kill on YouTube... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/15a4788c/podcast/rss

item.title: Babel
item.description:
The Delta Flyers is a weekly podcast hosted by Garrett Wang, Robert Duncan McNeill, Terry Farrell & Armin Shimerman. In each podcast release they will recap and discuss an episode of Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. This weekâ€™s episode is Babel.

Babel: A virus infects the station's residents, making almost everyone unable to speak coherently. Aboard Deep Space 9, Chief O'Brien is feeling both overworked and underappreciated... Feed: https://feeds.captivate.fm/the-delta-flyers/
